about_the_game:
Late Night At Hank's - Play as Unkindlynx, a short stocky fellow with a tidy beard, and a bit of a syndrome. Hank is away for the weekend and needs someone to take care of the property. Thankfully Lynx has offered to stay and house-sit for Hank.

Hank got this property dirt cheap and has been told by the realtor and locals that all previous tenants have died there in horrific ways; this has never bothered him before in the past ten years, but the anniversary of the first killing is on this weekend, and he is feeling quite uncomfortable. Just in case, Hank has left a supply of emergency tools for Lynx and ran off for the weekend. It's not a Hank and Lynx experience without Hank 'roaching' out to save his own hide.

Delve into a slightly comedic, short first-person experience, discover the tools and info left for Lynx by Hank. Things don't seem quite right in Hank's house; Creepies and Crawlies pussyfoot through the forest at night, there's occult figures and symbols throughout the home. What could be possessing this property?

Discover the dark secret of Hank's home and cleanse it of its demons to get out alive.
Be aware of your surroundings, things might seem calm but there are beings out there to get Lynx as he uncovers the secrets of Hank's home. Jump-scares, dangerous creatures of the night and intense moments of fleeing are required. Can you get Lynx to safety?

Features:

Tight First-person controls

Inventory and item crafting

Detailed Graphics and Lighting

Hidden Achievements Scattered around the maps

English Voiced Dialogue

English Dialogue Subtitles

Puzzle Elements

Fetching

Escaping

Banishing by the holy side arm and more!

FAQ:

Q: How long is an average play session?

A: About 30min

Q: Is there much "re-playability"?

A: No, not really unless you missed achievements. This is a singular experience game that you can easily enjoy in an evening.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains elements of:

- Death,
- Blood and Gore,
- Psychological Horrors
- Mild and Frequent Coarse Language

Hank got this property dirt cheap and has been told by the realtor and locals that all previous tenants have died there in horrific ways; this has never bothered him before in the past ten years, but the anniversary of the first killing is on this weekend, and he is feeling quite uncomfortable. Just in case, Hank has left a supply of emergency tools for Lynx and ran off for the weekend. It's not a Hank and Lynx experience without Hank 'roaching' out to save his own hide.

Delve into a slightly comedic, short first-person experience, discover the tools and info left for Lynx by Hank. Things don't seem quite right in Hank's house; Creepies and Crawlies pussyfoot through the forest at night, there's occult figures and symbols throughout the home. name: Late Night At Hank's

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-12600 ( x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: These Are Known Supported Specifications, Other and Lower System Specifications May Be Supported, However they will be unofficially tested.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i9 14900KS (x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 4080 Super
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: These Are Known Supported Specifications, Other and Lower System Specifications May Be Supported, However, they will be unofficially tested.

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Late Night at Hank's is a short comedic horror experience. Stay the night at Hank's cheaply purchased property during the weekend of the first death in the house. Uncover Hank's hidden occult nature and how he's been evading the creatures that haunt his property.
